# add(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified selection to the receiving selection.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ selection: PDFSelection)
```

## Discussion

Selections do not have to be contiguous. If the selection to be added overlaps with the receiving selection, the overlap is removed in a process called normalization.

## Modifying a Selection

- **add(_:)**: Adds the specified array of selections to the receiving selection.
- **extend(atEnd:)**: Extends the selection from its end toward the end of the document.
- **extend(atStart:)**: Extends the selection from its start toward the beginning of the document.
